Uses of Interface
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.Event

Packages that use Event
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.common
Classes common to the server and the client of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.mvevents
Classes that implement the events from the model to a view of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.mvevents.errors
Classes that implement the error events from the model to a view of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.netevents
Classes that implement the events concerning networking.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.netevents.errors
Classes that implement the error events concerning networking.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.vcevents
Classes that implement the events from a view to the controller of the Masters of Renaissance game.

    void

    void
    AsynchronousEventDispatcher.dispatch​(T event)
     
    <T extends Event>
    void
    EventDispatcher.dispatch​(T event)
    Dispatches an event to all listeners listening for Events of that class.
    <T extends Event>
    void
    EventDispatcher.removeEventListener​(Class<T> eventType, EventListener<? super T> listener)
    Unregisters a listener, preventing it from receiving Events.
